doc.field: II, Helen and Carl Winter Papers
II, Helen and Carl Winter Papers
Alfred Wagenknecht and Hortense Allison and Helen and Carl Winter Family Papers
Alfred Wagenknecht and Hortense Allison and Helen and Carl Winter Family Papers

Series is comprised of biographical materials on and memorabilia belonging to Carl and Helen Winter, and other members of their families, including Helen Winter's parents Hortense Allison and Alfred Wagenknecht. Includes memorial programs, obituaries, clippings, condolence cards, biographies, oral histories, and honors. Genealogical materials collected by Judith Allison Walters include collections of poetry written by Elmer Allison, and compilations of early family letters.
Alfred Wagenknecht and Hortense Allison and Helen and Carl Winter Family Papers
